title: Membership Proposal: Michael Francesconi ⚔️
body:
Michael Francesconi (`@ArchitectureEme`) has attended our weekly calls and contributed valuable input and research in our channels 🏹. 

A vote has been created in `LexDAO MYSTIC 🧙0x057e820D740D5AAaFfa3c6De08C5c98d990dB00d`, `proposalIndex 4`, to grant Francesconi `0xced20757aEaB2d2C8825a5CE47Fa52edA1410dC5` `1000 MYSTIC` voting shares, 1:1 with the rest of our current membership 🗳️.  

Effective votes on `Ethereum mainnet` can be cast using our basic Etherscan dapp here: https://etherscan.io/address/0x057e820d740d5aaaffa3c6de08c5c98d990db00d#writeContract , calling function #17 `submitVote`on `proposalIndex 4` with one of the following `uintVote` values: `0` - ABSTAIN / `1` - YEA / `2` - NEA. 

This `snapshot` serves to record soft consensus and avoid unnecessary network fees.
author: 0x1C0Aa8cCD568d90d61659F060D1bFb1e6f855A20
